item.title: SS7 or when scp it is not OpenSSH secure file copy
item.description: SS7 or when scp it is not OpenSSH secure file copy # SS7 - Signaling System 7 is a set of international telecommunication signaling protocols that are used to set up most of the world’s public switched telephone network (PSTN) telephone calls.
